duties_responsibilities.duty: Respond to crisis situations (pager requests/codes) to provide pastoral care and support patients and families in need.
Conduct spiritual assessments and provide appropriate pastoral care to patients and families of diverse cultural and religious backgrounds.
Assist patients in completing Advance Directives and provide grief counseling and bereavement care as needed.
Collaborate with hospital staff and clergy from various faith groups to meet the spiritual, cultural, and emotional needs of patients and families.

education_certification.credential: Master of Divinity degree or equivalent from an accredited theological school. One (1) unit of Clinical Pastoral Education from an ACPE accredited center.
